add_library(SDL3 SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
set_target_properties(SDL3 PROPERTIES
        IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/external/SDL3/SDL3.dll"
        IMPORTED_IMPLIB "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/external/SDL3/SDL3.lib"
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/external/SDL3/include"
)
